content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1547844020366{padding-top: 30vh !important;padding-bottom: 20vh !important;background-image: url(http://www.atrinternational.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Capture15.jpg?id=1327) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”custom-overlay gradient-overlay”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Diverse Careers

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1548113042283{padding-top: 120px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Get the job you deserve

 

Do you want to work with a company that values and promotes diversity? Then it’s time to partner with a recruiter who understands who you are and what you want out of life.

 

Since 1988, we’ve fought to balance the scales by helping diverse professionals find jobs and workplace cultures where they can thrive. As a Hispanic-owned, WBENC-certified Minority Business Enterprise, ATR strives to lift up historically underserved communities.

 

We didn’t become the diverse supplier of choice for small and large businesses in a vacuum. As you’ll discover on this page, ATR partners with numerous diverse organizations, fostering the crucial connections that make inclusivity in the workplace possible. From the National Minority Supplier Development Council to Girls in Tech, ATR has aligned itself with like-minded groups that can help us in our goal to make the world of work a more diverse place, one job at a time.

 

The end result for you is an opportunity to showcase your strengths and bring value to a company that appreciates everyone.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner gap=”20″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Find diverse careers today

 

If you’re ready to work with a staffing partner that truly values what you bring to the table, head to our Job Search page and take the first step on a more inclusive professional journey.

 

Find Diverse Careers Today

 

 

No time to search?

 

At ATR, we understand that life gets busy. If you’d rather cut to the chase and submit your resume, we’ll get in touch if your experience matches up with great opportunities in IT, engineering, accounting, medical, and more.

 

Submit Your Resume

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space][vc_empty_space][vc_single_image image=”7130″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Diversity Blogs

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

How Can AI Drive Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion in the Recruitment Process?

02.29.2024 | Artificial Intelligence, Diversity

Can AI-powered recruiting tools transform your workforce? While only 25% of organizations use artificial intelligence for HR-related activities, mainly to save time and money, this revolutionary technology can serve an even greater purpose—beyond generating job descriptions and streamlining workflows.  AI has the power to diversify your candidate base and drive unbiased decision-making throughout the hiring […]

Read the Article

ATR International Achieves WBENC Certification in 35th Year of Business

01.03.2024 | ATR International, Awards, Diversity

Sunnyvale, CA – ATR International, a leading staffing and consulting firm specializing in technical workforce solutions, is proud to announce its recent achievement of WBENC Certification, marking a significant milestone in the company’s ongoing commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion. Andrea Brenholz, CEO & President of ATR International, expressed her enthusiasm about the accolade: “As […]

Read the Article

3 Supplier Diversity Program Best Practices to Drive Mutual Success

09.13.2023 | Diversity, Supplier Diversity

The benefits of having a diverse supply chain have been well-studied and documented, proving its positive impact on business success. Supplier diversity drives growth and profitability while contributing to a strong, organization-wide commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion (DE&I).  People—whether they are potential customers, employees, or vendors—feel more positively about and are more likely to […]

Read the Article

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Don't just take our word for it

  • I have consistently been impressed by ATR’s commitment to the MBE community and their active participation in supporting diversity and sharing their experience and knowledge.

     

    -ATR Client

  • I have seen firsthand their commitment to the diversity community, exemplified in several ways. They share their knowledge and experience with other MBEs.

     

    -ATR Client 

  • ATR is a valuable member of the minority business community.

     

    -ATR Client

    • [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

    Partner Organizations

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1511″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1503″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1508″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1509″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5948″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5947″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5946″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

    Diversity Awards

    Our efforts to recruit diverse, talented professionals for our clients and our ability to find great jobs for diverse job seekers have been recognized with a number of awards and distinctions, including:

    2022 Bronze Stevie® Award, Women-Run Workplace of the Year

    2022 SIA List of Diversity-Owned Staffing Firms

    2022 Ethics in Sales Award (The Stevie® Awards)

    2021 SIA DE&I Influencers List: Angelique Alvarez

    2021 Latinx Business Leadership Awards (Silicon Valley Business Journal)

    2021 40 Under 40: President & CEO Andrea Brenholz (Silicon Valley Business Journal)

    2020 Latino Business Leadership Award (Silicon Valley Business Journal)

    2018 TAPFIN Top Partner Award

    2018 #3 Largest woman-owned businesses in Silicon Valley (Silicon Valley Business Journal)

    2018 #3 Largest minority-owned businesses in Silicon Valley (Silicon Valley Business Journal)

    2018 #14 Largest Family-Owned Businesses in Silicon valley (Silicon Valley Business Journal)

    2018 #35 Largest private companies in Silicon Valley (Silicon Valley Business Journal)

    2017 NMSDC National Supplier of the Year

    2017 National WRMSDC Supplier of the Year

    2016 Top 100 Hispanic Owned Businesses

    2016 DiversityBusiness.com Top Diversity Owned Business

    2016 Hispanic Business Enterprise Elite Honoree by the United States Hispanic Chamber of Commerce

    2016 United States Hispanic Chamber of Commerce Hispanic Business Enterprise Elite Honoree

    2015 DiversityBusiness.com Top 500 Diverse Business

    2015 WRMSDC Supplier of the Year2014 & 2015 WRMSDC Volunteer of the Year

    2014 NMSDC Regional Supplier of the Year

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

    Get In Touch

    [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
